trends: There have been 2 other sightings in Redford
There were no other sightings in Redford on or around June 20th 1998
divs: Sighting DetailsI was sitting in the park infront of my house around midnight this night looking up at the sky and saw this object it seemed to be about the altitude of a satellite infact thats what i thought it was at first..it was slowly moving across then suddenly stopped after about staying a few minutes in an idol position..it shot off making a shape of a star almost and shot off into space...im just reporting this which the incident happened in 1998 i didnt know where to report it until now..the incident is still so very clear in my mind.
Summary: Thought was a satellite then it stopped and almost made a full star shape and shot straight off into space
